title: Taking care of your pets
brief_description: An appeal to all animal lovers to assist with the humane work of caring for our sick and injured animal population. Illustrates the medical attention provided at the Dogs’ Home and Hospital; the work of ambulances treating animals injured by modern high-speed traffic; the work of the dog catchers collecting stray animals from the streets and the subsequent care of these at the Dogs’ Home.
